      • getDateFormat

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getDateFormat()
        The date format to use when serializing and deserializing dates.
        Returns:
        the date format to use

      • isWriteDatesAsTimestamps

        @Bindable(defaultValue="true")
boolean isWriteDatesAsTimestamps()
        Whether to write dates as time stamps. Defaults to true.

        If set to false the default ISO formats will be used to format dates as strings.

        Returns:
        Whether to write dates as timestamps
        See Also:
        DateTimeFormatter

      • getLocale

        java.util.Optional<java.util.Locale> getLocale()
        Returns:
        The default locale to use.

      • getTimeZone

        java.util.Optional<java.util.TimeZone> getTimeZone()
        Returns:
        The default time zone to use.

      • getIncludedIntrospectionPackages

        @Bindable(defaultValue="io.micronaut")
java.util.List<java.lang.String> getIncludedIntrospectionPackages()
        The packages containing introspections that should be regarded as serializable by default without the need to add the Serdeable annotation.
        Returns:
        the packages to include
